value.name: Clermont County judge sentences woman for 'cold-blooded' murder of husband
value.description: A Clermont County judge sentenced a woman to life in prison for murdering her husband. Angelina Hamrick isn't eligible for parole for 30 years. Angelina Hamrick shot Jason Hamrick to death in 2019. His body was found about a half-mile from his Tate Township home on June 30,

value.name: Man arrested after £14.5k of cannabis seized by police in Inverness
value.description: A man has been arrested and charged in connection with alleged drug and road offences after police recovered £14,500 of cannabis in Inverness.

value.name: POLICE LOG
value.description: Police took him into custody following a short chase on foot. Court records show that Judge Michael Clark issued warrants for Bingaman when he failed to appear June 30 to face two unrelated felony drug distribution charges and seven related counts.
